doc.title: Links a ɛwɔ domain din ahorow
doc.checkedUseSetting: Hwɛ sɛ wobɛma nhyehyɛe yi atumi ayɛ adwuma.
doc.excludeDomains: Fa domain din a wɔbɛyi afiri mu ka ho.
doc.description: Saa nhyehyeɛ yi hyɛ aseɛ berɛ a domain din no yɛ soronko.

example.domain: Wubetumi de domain din bi aka ho, te sɛ {{url}}, de ayi domain din no nyinaa afi mu.
example.url: Wubetumi ayi nkitahodi pɔtee bi afi mu denam nkitahodi bi a wode bɛka ho, te sɛ {{url}}.
example.glob: Wubetumi de {{glob}} nhwɛsode bi aka ho, te sɛ {{minimatch}}, ama fuzzy matching.
